actions.text: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 93 - 327 (Roll no. 383).

description: Amendment sought to provide an additional $10.5 million in funding for the Counter-electronics High Power Microwave Missile Project and to reduce funding for the Rapid Innovation Fund by a similar amount.
purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 113-170 to reduce appropriations for Defense-wide rapid innovation and increases the appropriations to develop a high power microwave cruise missile weapon.
